body_html:
I think it is fine in core. There's no experimentation with the interface needed, which is usually the concern. If its functionality is not a complete mirror of numpy's we have to document the differences clearly.

In this case, it should be noted that transpose doesn't work, are there other differences that are not documented yet?

body:
I think it is fine in core. There's no experimentation with the interface needed, which is usually the concern. If its functionality is not a complete mirror of numpy's we have to document the differences clearly. 

In this case, it should be noted that transpose doesn't work, are there other differences that are not documented yet?
